name: Atlantis (Tronic Verlag)
overview: Published in Compute mit 1986/11 and re-released by Curbois software (without permission) the following year, this is another remake of the classic 2600 Atlantis where you have to defend the mythical lost city of Atlantis. Enemy spaceships are trying to destroy the Atlantean Capitol. You man the defense and can blast the invaders. The enemy fleet will return and attempt to get progressively lower. If one of your foe's ships survives long enough, it will use it's weapons and destroy part of the city. As the attack wears on the ships will come faster and faster, don't miss and don't give up!
